title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Teacher Involvement in Learning Study

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Methodologies and Elementary Curriculum Management Experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core aspects of learning research (based on variation theory).
Learners can observe the stages of conceptual change exhibited by students during learning research processes.
Learners can critically reflect on their own teaching perceptions by applying phenomenological research methods.
Learners can develop strategies to address challenges that arise when designing learning research in large-classroom environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
